contentrichtext.text: '''Chauvin''' is a common French name and may refer to: ;People *[[Ingrid Chauvin]], French actress; *[[Louis Chauvin]], American ragtime composer; *[[Nicolas Chauvin]], a mythical patriot said to have served during Napoleon Bonaparte's reign; origin of the term [[chauvinism]]; *[[Pierre de Chauvin de Tonnetuit]] (1575-1603), a French naval and military captain and a lieutenant of New Franc; *[[Pierre-Athanase Chauvin]], a French painter active in Italy; *[[Remy Chauvin]] (1913â€“2009), a French biologist; *[[Yves Chauvin]], a Nobel prize-winning French chemist. ;Places *[[Chauvin, Louisiana]], United States, a town in the Bayou Chauvin; *[[Chauvin, Alberta]], Canada, a village {{disambig}}
